embedded.title: Secure Stripe checkout
embedded.error: Unable to load the secure checkout experience. Please try again.
embedded.subtitle: Complete your Coello Sleeve purchase without leaving the site.
embedded.secureNote: Stripe encrypts every transaction and calculates tax automatically.
embedded.secureDescription: We will confirm your delivery as soon as the payment succeeds.

success.body: Payment confirmed. We'll email your receipt and confirm delivery shortly.

processing.body: Your payment is processing. This usually takes a few seconds.

open.body: We're waiting for Stripe to confirm your payment. This page will update automatically.

error.body: We couldn't confirm your payment yet. If you were charged, please contact support.

returnPage.title: Payment review
returnPage.missingSession: Open this page from the Stripe receipt so we can locate your order.
